# BICEP/Keck Array June 2021 Data Products
# BICEP/Keck XIII: Constraints on Primordial Gravitational Waves using Planck, WMAP, and BICEP/Keck Observations through the 2018 Observing Season
# http://bicepkeck.org/
#
# File: bandpass_BK18_B95e.txt
# Date: 2021-06-07
#
# Experiment bandpasses for the multi-component likelihood described in BICEP/Keck Array XIII.
# See the comments in the .dataset file for further information.
# This file provides the frequency spectrum for: BK18_B95e.
#   Column 1 = frequency in GHz
#   Column 2 = response to a beam-filling source with uniform spectral radiance
# This convention matches the one used in the Planck Reduced Instrument
# Model (http://pla.esac.esa.int/pla, see Planck 2013 results IX).
#
# Bandpass has been peak-normalized. 
# Negative values are at the noise level of the Fourier-transform spectroscopy
# measurement.
